invention-title.$: Fixed dose combinations and formulations comprising ETC1002 and ezetimibe and methods of treating or reducing the risk of cardiovascular disease

p.$: Disclosed herein are compositions comprising fixed doses of ETC-1002 and Ezetimibe. Also disclosed herein are methods for using fixed doses of ETC-1002 and Ezetimibe. Uses include methods of treating cardiovascular disease or reducing the risk of cardiovascular disease in a subject. Uses also include methods of treating hypercholesterolemia in a subject.
